alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Leon; Liberty; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Jackson, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida, Walton and southern Holmes Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida, Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida and western Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Chattahoochee to 8 miles south of Vernon to near Niceville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Blountstown, Marianna, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Live Oak, Sneads, Freeport, Bristol, Cottondale, Grand Ridge and Ponce De Leon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Leon; Liberty; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
